cause.description:
there is many puppy mills....if anyone know about it, they know that puppy mills breed dogs in horrable conditions. they use mothers with sons, brother and sisters...ect...once they are old they kill the dogs to make room for more....they arnt fed for days....its just a really bad condition for any animals to be living in....they tryed to make it so that there would be no more puppy mills a few years ago and the goverment turned down the bill because farmers go in the way......how ever cows get more respect then what these poor dogs get....help me fight this cause and bring down pupy mills forever!!!!!!
1. Canada's puppy mills must end
2. Dogs need loving care.
cause.name: puppy mills
